SummaryEnglish: Yoshizou Yukawa is a passionate hot springs enthusiast—a hot springs hunter who was able to sniff out the source of springs. One day, while searching for a hidden hot spring to revitalize a town, he slips off a cliff and dies. He is then reincarnated into another world by an Inari deity of a small shrine hidden in the rocks. Yoshizou is joined by Inari's messenger princess, Mayudama. The hot spring hunter within Yoshizou is stirred right away, as he takes a bath with Mayudama in the hot spring he just discovered. Then, an elf girl appears...
Aliases: 名湯『異世界の湯』開拓記1～アラフォー温泉マニアの転生先は、のんびり温泉天国でした～
Meitō "Isekai no Yu" Kaitaku-ki: AraFō Onsen Mania Tensei-saki wa, Nonbiri Onsen Tengoku Deshita
Meitou "Isekai no Yu" Kaitaku-ki: AraFou Onsen Mania Tensei-saki wa, Nonbiri Onsen Tengoku Deshita
Meitou "Isekai no Yu" Kaitaku-ki: Arafou Onsen Mania no Tensei Saki wa, Nonbiri Onsen Tengoku deshita
Meitō "Isekai no Yu" Kaitaku-ki~ AraFō Onsen Mania Tensei-saki wa, Nonburi Onsen Tengoku Deshita~
Meitou "Isekai no Yu" Kaitaku-ki~ AraFou Onsen Mania Tensei-saki wa, Nonburi Onsen Tengoku Deshita~
Isekai no Yu" Kaitakuki: Around Forty Onsen Mania no Tenseisaki wa Nonbiri no Onsen Tengoku deshita
Pioneer Log of the Storied Hot Springs "Alternate World's Springs": The Reincarnation Destination of an Onsen Fan (Who's Around 40) Was a Relaxing Hot Spring Paradise

1.TitleEnglish: Fox Girl and Hot Spring Etiquette
1.SummaryEnglish: Hot spring hunter Yukawa Yoshizou finds himself transported to another world with Inari's messenger princess, Mayudama-san. Smelling the smell of sulfurous springs, he ignores the mysterious world and rushes towards the smell.

2.TitleEnglish: Elf Girl and the Breach of Etiquette
2.SummaryEnglish: As Kozo and Mayudama are bathing together, an elf girl appears in front of them. For some reason, she is openly hostile and attacks the naked Kozo and Mayudama with magic.

3.TitleEnglish: People of the Forest and the Botanical Hot Spring
3.SummaryEnglish: Lilium, an elf girl, is defeated by Mayudama. She is stripped naked and thrown into a newly discovered moor spring in the forest. It seems that elves fear hot springs as cursed springs of death...

4.TitleEnglish: The Elf Chief and the Cursed Spring
4.SummaryEnglish: Thanks to Yoshizo and Mayudama, Lilium discovers the wonders of hot springs. Yoshizo explains that hot springs are a gift from nature that should be shared with everyone. Then, Lilium's sister, Ohendek, the chief of the elves, appears.

5.SummaryEnglish: Ohendek also joins Yoshizo and the others in the mixed bath. Just when he thinks he's enjoying the wonders of the hot springs, he is astonished to see Mayudama's fox ears and tail, and hurriedly bows his head.

6.TitleEnglish: A Bright Idea and the Benefits of Hot Springs
6.SummaryEnglish: While Mayudama and Lilium become good friends, Ohendek is intrigued by the effects of the hot springs that Yoshizo talks about. The elf village is currently facing financial difficulties, and they want to use the hot springs to overcome this.

7.SummaryEnglish: Yoshizo comes up with a plan to build a hot springs town in the elf village. Mayudama, Lillium, and Ohendek start daydreaming about what a sexy hot springs town would look like...

8.SummaryEnglish: In order to bring back vitality to his hometown, Yoshizo was searching for a hot spring that could become a tourist attraction. After falling off a cliff, he was reincarnated into another world by the Inari deity of a small, forgotten shrine.

9.TitleEnglish: Komachi and the Leader of the 10 Clans
9.SummaryEnglish: Ruirui, the king who rules over another world, summons Kozo and his friends to his castle, where they are currently building a hot spring resort. Komachi, who is waiting at Ruirui's side, is none other than Mayudama's senior errand princess. But Ruirui seems to have some kind of purpose...

10.TitleEnglish: The King's Request and Kozo's Desire
10.SummaryEnglish: Ruirui, like Kozo, was a reincarnated person from another world. Hiding the fact that she was a woman, she assumed the throne and tried to change the world by making Kozo her vassal.

11.TitleEnglish: Cursed Bloody Hot Spring and Mead
11.SummaryEnglish: Mayudama says she wants Kozo to live as long as possible in the other world. Kozo hears through Komachi what she really means when she hears this. Everyone else arrives and enjoys the blood-red iron-rich spring.

12.SummaryEnglish: The hot spring town is finally complete. Mayudama is surprised when she sees the sign at the hot spring inn. It reads "Mayudama no Yu" (Mayudama's Bath), with her own name written on it. Yoshizo explains why he named it that way.
